Description: On US-33 in the County of Louisa, in the vicinity of Old Louisa Rd; Rt. 691N/S (Louisa County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 149 in the County of Goochland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The west right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 106.8 in the County of Montgomery, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-58 in the City of Portsmouth, at Midtown Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 97.3 in the County of Hanover, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
